OFFERED.title: Can you beat this challenge?
OFFERED.body: Congratulations! You have saved so much you've unlocked a special challenge. Save R100 now to unlock it!

UNLOCKED.title: Boost challenge unlocked!
UNLOCKED.body: Your top up was successful and you stand a chance to win R20. Follow the instructions below to play the game

INSTRUCTION.title: Boost challenge unlocked!
INSTRUCTION.body: Youâ€™ve unlocked this challenge and stand a chance of winning R20, but only if you can catch the arrow. Challenge will remain open until the end of the day

REDEEMED.title: Well Done!
REDEEMED.body: You caught the arrow #{numberUserTaps} times! You won the challenge and R20 has been boosted to your account!

FAILURE.title: Sorry, better luck next time!
FAILURE.body: You missed out on this boost challenge, but keep an eye out for future boosts to earn more towards your savings!

gameParams.instructionBand: Tap the screen as many times as you can in 20 seconds
